targets.expr: count(sum((kube_pod_status_phase{exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"cassandra[0-9].*", phase="Running"} * 8) or (kube_pod_status_ready{exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"cassandra[0-9].*", condition="false"} * 2)) by (exported_pod) == 8)

panels.description: Shows pod statuses

targets.expr:
sum((kube_pod_status_phase{exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"$instance", phase="Failed"} * 1) or 
(kube_pod_status_phase{exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"$instance", phase="Pending"} * 4) or
(kube_pod_status_phase{exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"$instance", phase="Running"} * 8) or (kube_pod_status_ready{exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"$instance", condition="false"} * 2) or 
(kube_pod_status_phase{exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"$instance", phase="Succeeded"} * 16) or 
(kube_pod_status_phase{exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"$instance", phase="Unknown"} * 32)) by (exported_pod)

panels.description: Shows CPU usage per container in pod against resource requests and limits

targets.expr: sum(sum by (namespace, pod, container)(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="",io_kubernetes_container_name!="POD",pod=~"$instance",namespace="$namespace",container=~"cassandra[0-9]+"}[$inter]))) by (container, pod)
